message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $120. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the quality of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $95 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm happy to negotiate. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product. I hope this meets within your range.
